text.0: borne on with thee o manyu girt by maruts let our brave men impetuous bursting forward.
text.1: march on like flames of fire in form exulting with pointed arrows sharpening their weapons.
text.2: flashing like fire be thou o conquering manyu invoked o victor as our armys leader.
text.3: slay thou our foes distribute their possessions show forth thy vigour scatter those who hate us.
text.4: o manyu overcome thou our assailant on breaking slaying crushing down the foemen.
text.5: they have not hindered thine impetuous vigour mighty sole born thou makest them thy subjects.
text.6: alone or many thou art worshipped manyu sharpen the spirit of each clan for battle.
text.7: with thee to aid o thou of perfect splendour we will uplift the glorious shout for conquest.
text.8: unyielding bringing victory like indra o manyu be thou here our sovran ruler.
text.9: to thy dear name o victor we sing praises we know the spring from which thou art come hither.
text.10: twinborn with power destructive bolt of thunder the highest conquering might is thine subduer.
text.11: be friendly to its in thy spirit manyu o muchinvoked in shock of mighty battle.
text.12: for spoil let varuṇa and manyu give us the wealth of both sides gathered and collected.
text.13: and let our enemies with stricken spirits oerwhelmed with terror slink away defeated.
